{"id":1219644370,"question_id":680,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1711936103,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"10 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1219644370/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"49.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    boolean found = false;\n    boolean check(String s, int i, int j, boolean deleted){\n        if(i>=j || found == true){\n            found = true;\n            return true;\n        }\n\n        if(s.charAt(i) == s.charAt(j)){\n            return check(s, i+1, j-1, deleted);\n        }else if(deleted == true){\n            return false;\n        }else{\n            return check(s, i+1, j, true)|check(s, i, j-1, true);\n        }\n    }\n    public boolean validPalindrome(String s) {\n        return check(s, 0, s.length()-1, false);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
